SELECT A.REQST_NO REQST_NO , A.REQST_DT REQST_DT, A.REQST_USER_ID REQST_USER_ID, A.BRNCH_TYPE BRNCH_TYPE, A.BRNCH_NAME BRNCH_NAME, A.CNFM_STUS CNFM_STUS , A.CNFM_STUS_NAME CNFM_STUS_NAME, A.FULL_NAME FROM (SELECT REQST_NO, TO_CHAR(REQST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') REQST_DT, REQST_USER_ID, BRNCH_TYPE, CNFM_STUS, B.USER_FULL_NAME FULL_NAME, C.CODE_NAME BRNCH_NAME, CASE WHEN (CNFM_STUS = 1) THEN 'ACT' WHEN (CNFM_STUS = 4) THEN 'COM' ELSE '' END CNFM_STUS_NAME FROM ORG0019M
INNER JOIN SYS0047M B ON REQST_USER_ID = B.USER_ID JOIN SYS0013M C ON BRNCH_TYPE = C.CODE_ID ) A WHERE 1=1
AND A.BRNCH_TYPE IN
( '42', '43', '45' , '48')
#{item}
AND LOWER ( A.REQST_NO ) = LOWER( #{requestNo} )
AND LOWER ( A.FULL_NAME ) like '%' || LOWER(#{requestUserId}) || '%'
AND TO_DATE (A.REQST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{requestDt},'DD/MM/YYYY')
GROUP BY A.REQST_NO,A.REQST_DT ,A.REQST_USER_ID,A.BRNCH_TYPE,A.BRNCH_NAME,A.CNFM_STUS,A.CNFM_STUS_NAME,A.FULL_NAME ORDER BY A.REQST_NO

SELECT AREA_ID, AREA, CITY, POSTCODE, STATE, CODY_BRNCH_CODE CODY_BRNCH_CODE, CODY_MANGR_USER_ID CODY_MANGR_USER_ID, CT_BRNCH_CODE CT_BRNCH_CODE, CT_SUB_GRP CT_SUB_GRP, SO_BRNCH_CODE, HT_CODE from SYS0064M where area_id in(select area_id from ORG0019M where reqst_no=#{reqstNo})

SELECT REQST_NO, AREA_ID, REQST_DT, REQST_USER_ID, CODY_BRNCH_CODE, CODY_MANGR_USER_ID, BRNCH_TYPE, CASE WHEN (BRNCH_TYPE = 42) THEN 'CODY BRANCH' ELSE 'DREAM SERVICE CENTER' END BRNCH_NAME, CT_BRNCH_CODE, CT_SUB_GRP, SO_BRNCH_CODE, HT_CODE FROM ORG0019M WHERE REQST_NO=#{reqstNo}
